argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_xnegpnf | |- -e +oo = -oo |
| 2 | 1 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( A *e -e +oo ) = ( A *e -oo ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> A e. RR* ) |
| 4 |  | #P_pnfxr | |- +oo e. RR* |
| 5 |  | #P_xmulneg2 | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ +oo e. RR* ) -> ( A *e -e +oo ) = -e ( A *e +oo ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( A *e -e +oo ) = -e ( A *e +oo ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_xmulpnf1 | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( A *e +oo ) = +oo ) |
| 8 |  | #P_xnegeq | |- ( ( A *e +oo ) = +oo -> -e ( A *e +oo ) = -e +oo ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> -e ( A *e +oo ) = -e +oo ) |
| 10 | 9, 1 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> -e ( A *e +oo ) = -oo ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( A *e -e +oo ) = -oo ) |
| 12 | 2, 11 | #P_syl5eqr | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ 0 < A ) -> ( A *e -oo ) = -oo ) |
